item.title: Unlock Pose Diversity: Accurate and Efficient Implicit Keypoint-based Spatiotemporal Diffusion for Audio-driven Talking Portrait
item.description: KDTalker: Accurate & efficient audio-driven talking portrait via implicit keypoint-based spatiotemporal diffusion, unlocking diverse & realistic animations.
